name: controlorigins-static-site
description: Control Origins static website - Business technology consulting services

scripts.build: npm run clean && node ./scripts/prepare-assets.mjs && npm run build:static
scripts.build:github: npm run build:static && npm run copy:github
scripts.copy:github: powershell -Command "$docs='docs'; $public='client/public'; $dist='dist/public'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force $docs | Out-Null; $cnameSrc = Join-Path $public 'CNAME'; $cnameDocs = Join-Path $docs 'CNAME'; $cname = $null; if (Test-Path $cnameSrc) { $cname = Get-Content $cnameSrc -Raw } elseif (Test-Path $cnameDocs) { $cname = Get-Content $cnameDocs -Raw }; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force (Join-Path $docs '*') -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force (Join-Path $dist '*') $docs/; if (Test-Path (Join-Path $docs 'index.html')) { Copy-Item -Force (Join-Path $docs 'index.html') (Join-Path $docs '404.html') }; if ($cname) { Set-Content -NoNewline -Path $cnameDocs -Value $cname }; New-Item -ItemType File -Force (Join-Path $docs '.nojekyll') | Out-Null"
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force docs/assets -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force client/public/assets -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
scripts.clean:assets: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Force attached_assets/*android-chrome* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Force attached_assets/*apple-touch* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Force attached_assets/*favicon* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Force attached_assets/site_* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
scripts.preview: npm run build:static && npx vite preview
scripts.deploy:github: npm run build:github && git add docs/ && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push
